About Me

BIO

I am an aspiring web designer with 3 years of experience in front-end development. I have worked on mulitple Sprint projects using Scrum agile development.

My projects includes: tranerapp-update application, restaurant application, Book Store application, RSVP application. I used JavaScript and ReactJS for the front-end and Java and MariaDB for the back-end.
